channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- BIOS

item.title: CVE-2022-32490|2024-08-03T07:39:51.069Z -- dell -- bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an improper input validation vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user may potentially exploit this vulnerability by using an SMI to gain arbitrary code execution in SMRAM.
